GLOBAL.MUSIC_DISABLED: Music is currently disabled due to issues. A fix is currently being worked on.
GLOBAL.GUILD_ONLY: You can only use this command in a server.
GLOBAL.MUSIC_INVALID_ACTION:
%username, that's not a valid action. If you want to play something, try `%prefixplay track:<song>`.
Cheque out `%prefixhelp category:audio` and `%prefixhelp command:playlists` for more things you can do!
GLOBAL.ONE_ACTION: You can only do 1 action at a time.
GLOBAL.MUSIC_SEE_OTHER: The current music session is over in %channel. Go there to see what's playing!
GLOBAL.VC_REQUIRED: %username, you need to join a voice channel to do that.
GLOBAL.VC_NOT_JOINABLE: %username, I don't have permission to join your voice channel.
GLOBAL.NO_LYRICS: Either there was an error fetching the lyrics, or there are none.
GLOBAL.TOO_MANY_SKIPS: You cannot skip more songs than are in the queue!
GLOBAL.SKIPPED_ALL: All of the songs in the queue has been skipped and the queue has been destroyed.
GLOBAL.TOKENS_DELETED: Deleted all your tokens. Use `%prefixmusictoken action:new` to generate a new one.
GLOBAL.TOKENS_NEW:
Your existing tokens were deleted, and a new one was created.
Do not share this token with anyone. If you do accidentally share it, you can use `%prefixmusictoken action:delete` to delete it and keep you safe.
You can now log in at %website
GLOBAL.TOKENS_PREVIOUS:
Here is the token you generated previously:
You can use `%prefixmusictoken action:delete` to delete it, and `%prefixmusictoken action:new` to regenerate it.
GLOBAL.TOKENS_NONE: You do not currently have any tokens. Use `%prefixmusictoken action:new` to generate a new one.
GLOBAL.EVERYONE_LEFT: Everyone left, so I have as well.
GLOBAL.NEWER_NOW_PLAYING: There's a newer now playing message.
GLOBAL.SONG_ERROR_EXCLAIMATION:
The internal identifier for the song was the placeholder value `!`
This is a bug.
GLOBAL.SONG_ERROR_NULL:
The internal identifier for the song was `null` or `undefined`
This is a bug.
GLOBAL.QUEUE_ENDED: It looks like this queue has ended.
GLOBAL.UNKNOWN_TRACK_EXCEPTION: There was an exception when trying to play that track. That's all I know.
GLOBAL.NO_USERS_IN_VC: Nobody else is in my voice channel. I will stop playing in %time seconds if nobody rejoins.
GLOBAL.ERRORS_SUPPRESSED:
Future errors from this queue will be silenced
If any more songs fail, they will be skipped with no message.
To report a bug, join our server: https://discord.gg/YMkZDsK
GLOBAL.CANNOT_PAUSE_LIVE: You cannot pause a live stream.
GLOBAL.SONG_INFO_FETCH_FAIL: Unfortunately, we failed to retrieve information about the current song.
GLOBAL.SONG_SELECTION_FOOTER: Choose one of the options below in the select menu to play. Expires after %timeout.
GLOBAL.IMAGE_FETCH_FAILED: There was an error fetching the image.
GLOBAL.INTERACTION_RESPONSE_3: I find it strange that you tried to do that...
GLOBAL.INTERACTION_RESPONSE_6: Come on... Don't make yourself look like an idiot...
GLOBAL.INTERACTION_RESPONSE_8: I'm not sure I understand you...
GLOBAL.CANNOT_SELF_SHIP: %username, you can't ship someone with themselves, silly
GLOBAL.SHIP_ALREADY_COUPLE_SELF: I don't think I have to rate you and %other if you two are already married. You're a cute couple %emoji
GLOBAL.SHIP_ALREADY_COUPLE_OTHER: I don't think I have to rate %user1 and %other if they're already married. They're a cute couple %emoji
GLOBAL.AVATAR_FETCH_FAILED: There was an error getting either user's avatar
GLOBAL.SHIP_RATING: I'd rate %display1 and %display2 being together a %percentage%
GLOBAL.INFO_THANKS:
Thank you for choosing me as your companion! :heart:
Here's a little bit of info about me...
GLOBAL.INFO_LINKS:
Visit Amanda's [website](%website) or her [support server](%server)
Wanna donate? Cheque out her [Patreon](%patreon) or make a 1 time donation through [PayPal](%paypal).
Wanna see Amanda's growth over time? You can [here](%stats)
Privacy Policy: %privacy
Todo board: %todo
GLOBAL.FOOTER_HELP: <> = required, [] = optional, | = or. Do not include <>, [] or | in your input.
GLOBAL.FOOTER_HELP_MAIN: Type `%prefixhelp [command:command]` to see more information about a command
GLOBAL.HELP_INVALID_COMMAND: **%tag**, I couldn't find the help panel for that command
GLOBAL.HELP_SEE_ALL:
Type `%prefixhelp [category:category]` to see all commands in that category.
Type `%prefixhelp [command:command]` to see more information about a command.
GLOBAL.HELP_INFO:
Type `%prefixinfo` to see general information about Amanda.
For more, join our support server: %link
GLOBAL.DATABASE_OFFLINE: The database is currently not connected. This is known and a fix is being worked on
GLOBAL.SEEK_GREATER_THAN_SONG_LENGTH: The time you provided was longer than the track's length
GLOBAL.SEEK_ERROR: There was an error with seeking to that position. Your duration was parsed properly as %parsed milliseconds, but LavaLink did not seek. This is a bug. Please report this: %server
GLOBAL.FILTERS_ERROR: There was an error applying the filters. The connection to the LavaLink node may have been dropped?
GLOBAL.FILTERS_APPLIED: The filters you specified are applying now. Please hold
GLOBAL.INVALID_PLAYLIST_NAME: Invalid playlist name. Playlist names must not contain a link or be longer than 24 characters
GLOBAL.PLAYLIST_CANNOT_MANAGE: You are not allowed to manage this playlist
GLOBAL.PLAYLIST_DUPLICATE_SONG: You tried to add a duplicate track to your playlist
GLOBAL.PLAYLIST_INDEXES_EQUAL: The from and to indexes cannot be equal
GLOBAL.TITLE_JOIN_SERVER: Click the title to join our support server
GLOBAL.SONG_INFO_GENERIC: Try getting this track's info on the website you found it on
GLOBAL.COMMAND_ERROR: There was an error with the command %name. The developers have been notified. If you use this command again and you see this message, please allow a reasonable time frame for this to be fixed. Report this if it occurs again: %server
GLOBAL.DM_ONLY: This command can only be used in DMs
GLOBAL.NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY: You don't have enough money for that
GLOBAL.FLIP_AMANDA_CHOSE_HEADS_WON: Since you didn't choose a side, I chose heads for you and you won %amount (+33%)
GLOBAL.FLIP_AMANDA_CHOSE_TAILS_WON: Since you didn't choose a side, I chose tails for you and you won %amount (+33%)
GLOBAL.FLIP_AMANDA_CHOSE_HEADS_LOST: Since you didn't choose a side, I chose heads for you and you lost %amount
GLOBAL.FLIP_AMANDA_CHOSE_TAILS_LOST: Since you didn't choose a side, I chose tails for you and you lost %amount
GLOBAL.CANNOT_GIVE_SELF: You cannot give money to yourself
GLOBAL.INVALID_DATA_TYPE_NO_DONOR_ARBITRARY: The value you provided to update that setting with is invalid. Valid values are %acceptable
GLOBAL.INVALID_DATA_TYPE_YES_DONOR_ARBITRARY: The value you provided to update that setting with is invalid. Donors are allowed to supply arbitrary values to this setting %link. Valid values are %acceptable
GLOBAL.USER_NOT_IN_COUPLE_WITH_YOU: That user isn't married to you.
GLOBAL.NONE_WITHDRAW: There is no money to withdraw
GLOBAL.CANNOT_WITHDRAW_MORE: You can't withdraw more than what is in the account
GLOBAL.PROPOSED: You have proposed to %user. They must accept for you two to become married
GLOBAL.YOU_SOMEHOW_PROPOSED_TO_YOURSELF: HOW DID YOU PROPOSE TO YOURSELF LOL???? PLEASE tell me how
GLOBAL.MARRIED_MULTIPLE_OTHERS: %user1 is now married to %user2 and %amount others

user1.name: user1
user1.description: The user to ship user2 with other than yourself

track.name: track
track.description: The track you'd like to play

position.name: position
position.description: 1 based index to start adding tracks from

position.name: position
position.description: 1 based index to start adding tracks from

start.name: start
start.description: 1 based index to start skipping tracks from

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of tracks to skip in the queue

queue.name: queue
queue.description: Show the queue and do actions

page.name: page
page.description: Choose what page in the queue to show

volume.name: volume
volume.description: Set the volume % of the queue

loop.name: loop
loop.description: Set the state of loop mode for the queue

pause.name: pause
pause.description: Sets the paused state of the queue

nowplaying.name: nowplaying
nowplaying.description: Show the queue now playing message

trackinfo.name: trackinfo
trackinfo.description: Shows info about the currently playing track

lyrics.name: lyrics
lyrics.description: Shows the lyrics of the currently playing track

seek.name: seek
seek.description: Seek to a time in the currently playing track

time.name: time
time.description: The time in seconds to seek in the track

pitch.name: pitch
pitch.description: Sets the pitch of the queue in semitones

speed.name: speed
speed.description: Sets the speed % of the queue

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Removes a track from the queue

index.name: index
index.description: The 1 based index of the track to remove

musictoken.name: musictoken
musictoken.description: Obtain a web dashboard login token

show.name: show
show.description: Shows all Amanda playlists. True to only show yourself

add.name: add
add.description: Adds a track to a playlist

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Removes a track from a playlist

index.name: index
index.description: The 1 based index of the track to remove

move.name: move
move.description: Moves a track in a playlist from one index to another

from.name: from
from.description: The 1 based index of the track to move

to.name: to
to.description: The 1 based index the track should appear at

query.name: query
query.description: The search term to filter by

shuffle.name: shuffle
shuffle.description: If the playlist should start shuffled

start.name: start
start.description: The 1 based index to start from. When shuffling, only a portion is selected and then shuffled

window.name: window
window.description: The type of stats to show

git.name: git
git.description: Gets the latest git commits to Amanda

category.name: category
category.description: The category to get help with

command.name: command
command.description: The command to get help with

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of money to bet

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of money to bet

money.name: money
money.description: Shows how much money you, another person, or a couple has

user.name: user
user.description: The user to check their bank info

couple.name: couple
couple.description: Whether to show the couple balance

leaderboard.name: leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Shows the leaderboard for the top users of money

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of money to give

user.name: user
user.description: The user to give money to

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of money to bet

light.name: light
light.description: If light mode should be force used (default false)

settings.name: settings
settings.description: Modify settings for Amanda to use

setting.name: setting
setting.description: The setting you want to modify/view

modify.name: modify
modify.description: What to modify the setting value to

couple.name: couple
couple.description: Get couple information about a user

user.name: user
user.description: The user to get info on

marry.name: marry
marry.description: Accepts a proposal from a user

reject.name: reject
reject.description: Rejects a proposal from a user

user.name: user
user.description: The user to remove from the marriage

withdraw.name: withdraw
withdraw.description: Withdraw money from your couple balance

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of money to withdraw

deposit.name: withdraw
deposit.description: Deposit money to your couple balance

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount of money to deposit

coupleleaderboard.name: coupleleaderboard
coupleleaderboard.description: Shows the leaderboard for top couples of money

move.name: move
move.description: Move a track in the queue to a new position

from.name: from
from.description: 1 based index of the track to move

to.name: to
to.description: 1 based index to move the track to

search.name: search
search.description: Search for a track from multiple sources

source.name: source
source.description: The website to use to search for the track
